sentences.en: If be duty already , manage person is in charge of, incontestable meeting produces a problem.
sentences.cn: 如果是职业经理人来管, 无可争辩地会产生问题.

sentences.en: It caused him to seek to embellish his most incontestable achievements.
sentences.cn: 这使他想对自己最无可争议的成就加以吹嘘.

sentences.en: It is incontestable that the patent technology implementation and industrialization are low here in China.
sentences.cn: 我国专利技术实施和产业化率较低,是个不争的事实.

sentences.en: The proof was incontestable – he had no choice but to admit defeat and plead guilty.
sentences.cn: 证据确凿,他不得不低头认罪.

sentences.en: We had incontestable proof of her innocence.

words.tran_cn: 无可争辩的；无可置疑的，不可否认的；明确的

trans.tran_cn: 无可争辩的，不可否认的，不容置辩
trans.tran_en: clearly true and impossible to disagree with
